About: Your trusted Textile Wholesaler, offering quality clothing and apparel in bulk lots.
welcome_message: Welcome to VRAJ TEX — your premier wholesale clothing partner. We specialize in premium quality apparel for women, men, and kids. From traditional ethnic wear to modern fashion, we offer comprehensive wholesale solutions for retailers and distributors across India.
VRAJ_TEX: Premium textile wholesale, blending quality and value.
address: 209 D R INDIA TEXTILE HUB, PARVAT PATIYA SURAT-395010.
AboutShort: VRAJ TEX is a leading textile wholesaler in Surat, offering a wide range of quality clothing and apparel in bulk lots for retailers and resellers across India. Trusted for value, variety, and service.
OnlyKurtis_Description: Discover an exclusive wholesale collection of kurtis in a wide range of styles, fabrics, and vibrant colors—perfect for retailers and resellers seeking premium quality, trendy designs, and unbeatable value, all under one roof at VRAJ TEX.

womens_wear.title: Women's Collection
womens_wear.description: Comprehensive range of women's clothing including kurtis, sarees, gowns, skirts, plazzo pants, dresses, and ethnic wear.

mens_wear.title: Men's Collection
mens_wear.description: Complete men's apparel including shirts, pants, t-shirts, formal wear, casual wear, and traditional ethnic clothing.

kids_wear.title: Kids Collection
kids_wear.description: Adorable kids clothing for all ages including dresses, shirts, pants, ethnic wear, and comfortable daily wear.

ethnic_wear.title: Ethnic Collection
ethnic_wear.description: Traditional and modern ethnic wear including sarees, lehengas, salwar suits, and traditional dresses.

western_wear.title: Western Collection
western_wear.description: Modern western wear including dresses, tops, jeans, skirts, and contemporary fashion items.

accessories.title: Accessories
accessories.description: Complete range of fashion accessories including dupattas, stoles, scarves, and other fashion items.

service1.title: Bulk Clothing Supply
service1.description: Comprehensive wholesale clothing for women, men, and kids. From ethnic to western wear, we supply all categories.

service2.title: Quality Assurance
service2.description: Premium quality fabrics and craftsmanship. Every product meets our strict quality standards for customer satisfaction.

service3.title: Competitive Pricing
service3.description: Best wholesale prices in Surat. Competitive rates for bulk orders with excellent profit margins for retailers.

service4.title: Wide Range
service4.description: Extensive collection covering all clothing categories. From traditional ethnic wear to modern western fashion.

service5.title: Reliable Supply
service5.description: Consistent stock availability and timely delivery. Dependable supply chain for your business needs.

service6.title: Wholesale Only
service6.description: Exclusive wholesale business model. Bulk orders only for serious retailers and distributors.

paymentinfo.heading: Payment Information
paymentinfo.scan_to_pay: Scan to pay with any UPI app
